mapper.insert: insert into restaurant_table (res_name, res_tel, category, res_postcode, res_address, res_detailAddress, res_extraAddress , owner_no) values (#{res_name}, #{res_tel}, #{category}, #{res_postcode}, #{res_address}, #{res_detailAddress}, #{res_extraAddress}, #{owner_no})
mapper.select: select res_no, res_name, res_regdate, category from restaurant_table where res_no > 0 order by res_no desc, res_regdate desc
